flawed_nl_solution:
Amanda has gone on 7 hikes x 8 = <<7*8=56>>56 hikes.
Steven has gone on 56 hikes + 15 hikes = <<56+15=75>>75 hikes.
Camila needs to go on another 75 hikes - 7 hikes = <<75-7=68>>68 hikes.
Camila will achieve her goal in 68 hikes / 4 hikes/week = <<68/4=17>>17 weeks.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 71, not 75. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
